mapper.select: SELECT member.* FROM (SELECT cm.member_num as memberNum , cm.member_name as memberName , cm.member_sex as memberSex , cm.member_phone as memberPhone , cm.member_email as memberEmail , cm.join_flag as joinFlag , cm.member_status as status , cmp.point as point , (CASE WHEN cwi.dw_date >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+7, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) as wdYn FROM CAFE_MEMBER cm , CAFE_MEMBER_POINT cmp , CAFE_WITHDRAWAL_INFO cwi WHERE cm.member_num = cmp.member_num AND cm.member_num = cwi.member_num(+) AND cm.member_email = #{email} ) member WHERE member.wdYn = 'N'
